channel.title: Comments on: There they stood, ranged along the hillsides, met
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Are you reading the Dark Tower books? I always think of that, rather than the poem it stems from when someone quotes it any more...Monica
item.content:encoded: Are you reading the Dark Tower books? I always think of that, rather than the poem it stems from when someone quotes it any more…Monica
